ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] High Level Blues
ygData.msgSnippet: If you re doing dreadlands to solo try pullin only ragers, petrified birdied (these i found were better) and brutes... spiders can be good too but a real pain
ygData.messageBody:
If you're doing dreadlands to solo try pullin only ragers, petrified birdied
(these i found were better) and brutes... spiders can be good too but a real
pain in the butt. Try the spider webs near FV zone as there's lotsa
widows/recluse there. As well as roaming petrified birds there with other
stuff. Sadly, I've found that in the wee hours of the morning dreadlands
and karnors have been the easiest spots to find a group/solo. Which ever was
my mood that morning. I know there are better spots but I don't like
wasting my time running around/gating in order to get to these spots and
seeing that they're camped. One of these spots being the bloodgills in lake
of ill omen. They're great xp and you can tank them and go toe to toe with
them. I finished my level 49 on them. Have about 6 ancient coins sitting in
the bank from them.





-----Original Message-----
From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
Sent: March 5, 2001 4:14 PM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] High Level Blues


Speaking of which, anyone have good spots for experience at 48-50ish? I
usually duo with a monk and we have a regen tunic at our disposal.
However, I also want to be able to solo in the mornings on weekends, etc.

We tried Dreadlands, mobs too low blue to get good xp, hit really hard. Sol
b was great and would still be good except for the crowded factor and I dont
think I can solo bats, even if I get a solo pull.

GD is too green, as is EW. Let me know your ideas please :)

Halana, 59th forever shaman
Tani 48th bardette
solusek ro
